definitions.definition: The process of approximating a continuous signal by a set of discrete symbols or integer values
A procedure for constructing a quantum field theory starting from a classical field theory ; to represent by quanta

main_definition: ( uncountable , signal processing ) The process of approximating a continuous signal by a set of discrete symbols or integer values
secondary_definitions: ( countable , physics ) A procedure for constructing a quantum field theory starting from a classical field theory ; to represent by quanta
